discover_amazing_products: LED Angel Eye Headlights for Supermoto
find_perfect_tech: Discover the best LED angel eye headlights for Supermoto, motorcycle LED lights and lighting accessories. Professional quality, innovative design and superior performance.

category_description: Explore our wide range of product categories

technical_steps: Technical Steps to Place an Order
stay_connected: Stay connected for updates and special offers.
faq_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ordering, shipping, returns, and more.
faq_contact_description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our customer service team is here to help.

ordering.question_1: How do I place an order?
ordering.answer_1: Simply browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You can either create an account for faster future orders or checkout as a guest.
ordering.question_2: Can I modify my order after placing it?
ordering.answer_2: Orders can be modified within 1 hour of placement. Please contact our customer service team immediately at support@rsp-industries.com or call +1 (555) 123-4567.
ordering.question_3: Do I need an account to place an order?
ordering.answer_3: No, you can checkout as a guest. However, having an account makes future orders easier and allows you to track your order history.
ordering.question_4: What payment methods do you accept?
ordering.answer_4: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

shipping.answer_1: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days (€5.99), express shipping takes 2-3 business days (€9.99), and next day delivery is available (€19.99). Free standard shipping on orders over €50!
shipping.answer_2: Yes, we ship to all EU countries. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by destination. Contact us for specific rates to your country.
shipping.question_3: How can I track my order?
shipping.answer_3: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing your order history.
shipping.question_4: What if my package is damaged or lost?
shipping.answer_4: If your package arrives damaged or is lost in transit, please contact us immediately. We'll work with the shipping carrier to resolve the issue and ensure you receive your items.

returns.answer_1: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be in original condition with original packaging and tags included. Items must be unworn and unused.
returns.answer_2: We provide free return shipping labels for all returns. Simply contact our customer service team and we'll email you a prepaid return label.
returns.question_3: How long does it take to process a refund?
returns.answer_3: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return. You'll receive an email confirmation once the refund has been processed.
returns.question_4: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
returns.answer_4: Yes! If you need a different size or color, we can process an exchange. Contact our customer service team to arrange an exchange.

account.question_1: How do I create an account?
account.answer_1: Click the "Register" button in the top right corner of our website. You'll need to provide your name, email address, and create a password.
account.question_2: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
account.answer_2: Click the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
account.question_3: How do I update my account information?
account.answer_3: Log into your account and go to "Account Settings" where you can update your personal information, addresses, and payment methods.
account.answer_4: Yes! You can save multiple shipping and billing addresses in your account for faster checkout. Just go to "Account Settings" > "Addresses".

general.question_1: How can I contact customer service?
general.answer_1: You can reach us by email at support@rsp-industries.com, call us at +1 (555) 123-4567, or use our contact form. Our hours are Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST.
general.answer_2: We strive to offer competitive prices. If you find a lower price on an identical item from a competitor, please contact us and we'll do our best to match it.
general.answer_3: Yes, we take your privacy seriously. We use SSL encryption, secure payment processing through Stripe, and never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.
general.question_4: Do you have a physical store?
general.answer_4: We are primarily an online retailer, but we do have a customer service center at 123 Business Street, City, State 12345. Please call ahead if you need to visit in person.

about.title: About Our Store
about.subtitle: We're passionate about bringing you the latest and greatest in technology, with a focus on quality, innovation, and exceptional customer service.
about.mission_text_1: To provide our customers with access to cutting-edge technology products that enhance their daily lives, backed by unparalleled customer support and competitive pricing.
about.mission_text_2: We believe that great technology should be accessible to everyone, and we work tirelessly to curate a selection of products that meet the highest standards of quality and innovation.
about.explore_cta: Discover our amazing collection of tech products and find something perfect for you.

success.thank_you_guest: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been successfully placed.
success.thank_you_user: Thank you, {{name}}! Your order has been successfully placed.
success.guest_order_notice: You can track this order using the order number above. Consider creating an account for easier order management.
success.step_1_desc: You'll receive a confirmation email shortly with your order details.
success.step_2_desc: We'll prepare your order for shipment within 1-2 business days.
success.step_3_desc: You'll receive tracking information once your order ships.
success.save_order_number: Save your order number for future reference

shipping_returns.title: Shipping & Returns
shipping_returns.subtitle: Information about our shipping policies and your right of withdrawal
shipping_returns.shipping_destinations_text: We ship to all EU Member States. We do not ship to PO boxes or remote territories.
shipping_returns.uk_notice: For UK deliveries, please note that additional customs delays may apply post-Brexit.
shipping_returns.carriers_text: We use trusted carriers including DHL, UPS, and local postal services. We reserve the right to select the most appropriate carrier for your delivery.
shipping_returns.shipping_costs_text: All shipping costs include VAT and are displayed before checkout. Free shipping is available for orders over €50.
shipping_returns.dispatch_text: Orders are dispatched within 1-2 business days. Delivery takes 3-5 business days for standard shipping.
shipping_returns.risk_transfer: Risk of loss or damage passes to you upon delivery to your specified address.
shipping_returns.missing_damaged_text: Please notify us within 48 hours of delivery if your parcel is missing or damaged. Photo evidence may be required for damage claims.
shipping_returns.no_free_returns: Our store does not offer free returns. Returns are only accepted if the product is defective or we have made an error with your order.
shipping_returns.withdrawal_text: Under EU consumer protection law, you have the right to withdraw from your purchase within 14 calendar days of delivery, but only in the following cases:
shipping_returns.defective_product: The product is defective or not as described
shipping_returns.wrong_item: We sent you the wrong item
shipping_returns.damaged_shipping: The product was damaged during shipping
shipping_returns.no_change_mind: We do not accept returns for change of mind, wrong size selection, or other non-defect related reasons.
shipping_returns.return_steps: To request a return for a defective product or our error:
shipping_returns.step_1: Contact us within 14 days of delivery
shipping_returns.step_2: Provide your order number and description of the issue
shipping_returns.step_3: Include photos if the product is damaged
shipping_returns.step_4: We will provide a return authorization (RMA) number
shipping_returns.return_shipping_text: For defective products or our errors, we will provide a prepaid return label. For all other cases, return shipping costs are borne by the customer.
shipping_returns.condition_text: Products must be returned in their original condition and packaging. Reasonable handling for inspection is allowed.
shipping_returns.partial_refunds: We reserve the right to apply partial refunds for items that show excessive wear beyond normal inspection handling.
shipping_returns.refund_text: Approved refunds will be processed within 14 days of receiving the returned item. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method.
shipping_returns.withhold_refund: We may withhold the refund until we receive and inspect the returned goods.
shipping_returns.dispute_text: For unresolved disputes, you may contact the Italian Consumer Ombudsman or use the EU Alternative Dispute Resolution platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.info_collect_text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.
privacy.personal_info: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
privacy.how_we_use_text: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services:
privacy.send_confirmations: Send order confirmations and shipping updates
privacy.info_sharing_text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except in the following circumstances:
privacy.service_providers: With service providers who help us operate our business
privacy.required_by_law: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.data_security_text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:
privacy.ssl_encryption: SSL encryption for all data transmission
privacy.access_update: Access and update your personal information
privacy.request_deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.request_copy: Request a copy of your data
privacy.cookies_text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
privacy.contact_privacy: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance_text: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.use_license_text: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
terms.use_commercial: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or public display
terms.reverse_engineer: Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
terms.remove_copyright: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
terms.disclaimer_text: The materials on this website are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.limitations_text: In no event shall RSP Industries or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on this website, even if we or our authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.
terms.accuracy_text: The materials appearing on this website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. We may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.
terms.links_text: We have not reviewed all of the sites linked to our website and are not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by us of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
terms.modifications_text: We may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
terms.governing_law_text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction] and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that state or location.
terms.contact_terms: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
